channel.title: Publications on Qian Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Qian Yang

item.title: Secure users oriented downlink MISO NOMA
Secure short-packet communications for mission-critical IoT applications
item.description: A secure IoT communication system in which an access point transmits confidential short-packet information to a trusted actuator in the presence of eavesdropping. The average secrecy throughput obtained by the simulation versus blocklength and the transmitted bit number per block under the case with a single-antenna AP, where the star markers denote the optimal blocklength and the corresponding approximated secrecy throughput.

item.title: Physical-layer secure transmissions in cache-enabled cooperative small cell networks
Delivery-secrecy tradeoff for cache-enabled stochastic networks: Content placement optimization
item.description: An illustration for the optimal cache placement strategy under different file secrecy levels, where the shadowed parts stand for the optimal placement probability.

item.title: Wireless powered asynchronous backscatter networks with sporadic short packets: Performance analysis and optimization
item.description: Stochastic B-WPC ad hoc network consisting of multiple RFID reader-tag pairs.

item.title: Cooperative transmission for physical layer security by exploring social awareness
NOMA in downlink SDMA with limited feedback: Performance analysis and optimization
item.description: The considered downlink cellular network with a multi-antenna BS and multiple single-antenna users. The NOMA technology is exploited to simultaneously serve multiple users under each spatial beam of SDMA.

item.title: Improving physical layer security for wireless ad hoc networks via full-duplex receiver jamming
Joint source-relay secure precoding for MIMO relay networks with direct links
Outage performance of NOMA in downlink SDMA systems with limited feedback
Secure transmissions in wireless ad hoc networks using hybrid half and full duplex receivers
Energy-efficient transmission design in non-orthogonal multiple access
The application of non-orthogonal multiple access in 5G physical-layer multi-region geocast
Safeguarding decentralized wireless networks using full-duplex jamming receivers
Physical layer security in distributed wireless networks using full-duplex receiver jamming
Physical layer security in MIMO backscatter wireless systems
item.description: The MIMO backscatter system, consisting of a RFID reader, a RFID tag, and a passive eavesdropper.

item.title: Energy efficiency optimization in cognitive radio inspired non-orthogonal multiple access
Secrecy throughput maximization for millimeter wave systems with artificial noise
The impact of relative distance on artificial-noise-aided secure transmission
Outage and throughput analysis of multi-antenna transmissions in heterogeneous cellular networks
Secrecy sum rate maximization in non-orthogonal multiple access
Transmit optimization for secure MIMO RFID wireless communication
Transmission focusing: A multi-antenna space hopping technique
